attributes.title: Roadmaps to Enlightenment || Part 2 || Shiva Sutras || 25 Jan 2005
attributes.description:
Title: Roadmaps to Enlightenment Part 2
Name Program: Shiva Sutras - Sastras
Session on: The difference and correlation between Shastras, Stotras and Tantra, and how to reach enlightenment by following these scriptures.
Date: 25 January 2005
Venue: Adikailaasa, Bengaluru, India

In this video Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism HDH #Nithyananda Paramashivam speaks about what it is that creates karma, and how we can clear this karma by living a conscious life. HDH also speaks about how human beings create subconsciousness. Stotras are wonderful techniques to go beyond the #karma. The missing link between Shastra and Stotra, is Tantra. Tantra means “Life Solution”, or “Technique”. Tantra is what connects Shastra and Stotra. The “Vijnana Bhairava Tantra”, a beautiful scripture delivered by the ultimate #Master, Shiva, does just this is.
